cases.question: What callbacks are available when streaming responses from the agent?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can find the StreamCallbacks section

cases.question: How do I cancel an ongoing request in the agent?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can find cancellation methods

cases.question: What are the different message roles in the agent module?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can find the Role enum

cases.question: How does session management work in the agent?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can explain session management

cases.question: What is the purpose of the Agent interface?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can describe the Agent interface

cases.question: How are tool results handled by the agent?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can explain tool result handling

cases.question: What is the default system prompt used by the agent?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can find the system prompt content

cases.question: How do I check if a session is busy processing a request?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can find the IsBusy method

cases.question: What methods does SessionStore provide?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can list SessionStore methods

cases.question: Why does the agent use two blocks for the system prompt?
cases.description: Tests if RAG can explain the OAuth system prompt requirement
